name: Pebbls Travel Tracker Map Embed
author: Pebbls Travel Tracker

sections.description:
Showcase Your Travel Adventures with Pebbls Travel Tracker Map Embed plugin.

Pebbls Adventures is an exciting new and free platform designed for adventurers to track, map, and share their journeys. With the Pebbls Travel Tracker Map Embed plugin, you can seamlessly showcase your Pebbls Adventures maps directly on your WordPress site. This plugin allows you to embed interactive maps and journey stats, providing your audience with an engaging way to explore and follow your adventures as they happen.

On the road, deep in the mountains, or sailing across an ocean, Pebbls Travel Tracker Map Embed lets you showcase your adventures with stunning maps and stats.

Your Journey, Beautifully Told

Key Features:

  • Interactive Travel Maps: Effortlessly embed dynamic maps that stay updated as you travel, showcasing your routes and the experiences you gather along the way.
  • Journey Stats: Display key journey statistics such as distance traveled and transportation methods with your adventure map.
  • Seamless Integration: Easily add travel maps to your posts or pages with the Gutenberg block editor.
  • Share Your Adventures: Share the journeys you’ve tracked with the Pebbls Adventures Tracking App on your WordPress site.

External Services

This plugin connects to the Pebbls Core API to fetch journey data for embedding maps within WordPress. The API is hosted on Pebbls.com.

Service Terms and Privacy Policies:
– Terms of Service
– Privacy Policy

By using this plugin, users agree to these terms as outlined by Pebbls.

License & Warranty

This plugin is released under the GPLv2 license. It is provided “as is” with no warranty of any kind.

Service Terms and Privacy Policies:
– Terms of Service
– Privacy Policy
sections.installation:
1. Upload the plugin files to the /wp-content/plugins/pebbls-journey-map-embed directory, or install the plugin through the WordPress plugins screen directly.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ screen in WordPress.
  3. Use the Pebbls Journey Map Embed block in your Gutenberg editor to add your journey map.
sections.faq:
How do I get my API Key?

You can obtain your API key by visiting Get your API key.

My API key isn’t working, what should I do?

Ensure your API key is correct and has not expired. If the issue persists, contact support via the Pebbls website.

Can I customize the map height?

Yes, you can customize the map height directly from the block settings in the Gutenberg editor.
sections.changelog:
1.0.2

  • Updated the plugin to serve SVG files locally instead of from external URLs.
  • Added proper documentation for the use of the Pebbls Core API.
  • Improved security and compatibility by prefixing all custom functions and classes.

1.0.1

  • Changed the way the API key is utilized to improve security and flexibility.

1.0.0

  • Initial release of the Pebbls Journey Map Embed plugin.

short_description: Easily embed customizable maps and journey stats from Pebbls into your WordPress site.

screenshots.caption: Embed your journey maps with customizable settings.
Display journey stats alongside your map.
Easily obtain and enter your API key for integration.
